name: Push-up
instructions: 1. Start in a plank position with your hands shoulder-width apart. 2. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor. 3. Push yourself back up to the starting position.

name: Squat
instructions: 1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out. 2. Lower your body as if you're sitting back into a chair, keeping your chest up and back straight. 3. Push through your heels to return to the starting position.

name: Pull-up
instructions: 1. Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart. 2. Pull your body up until your chin passes the bar. 3. Lower yourself back down to the starting position.

name: Plank
instructions: 1. Start in a push-up position with your hands directly under your shoulders. 2. Engage your core and hold your body in a straight line from head to heels. 3. Hold for the prescribed amount of time.

name: Deadlift
instructions: 1. Stand with your feet hip-width apart, toes under the bar. 2. Bend at your hips and knees, keeping your back straight, to grip the bar. 3. Lift the bar by straightening your hips and knees, keeping the bar close to your body. 4. Lower the bar back to the ground by bending at your hips and knees.

name: Bench Press
instructions: 1. Lie on a flat bench with your feet flat on the floor. 2. Grip the bar slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and lower it to your chest. 3. Press the bar upward until your arms are fully extended. 4. Lower the bar back to your chest and repeat.

name: Lunges
instructions: 1. Stand with your feet together and step forward with one leg, bending both knees to lower your body. 2. Push through the heel of your front foot to return to the starting position. 3. Repeat on the other side.

name: Russian Twist
instructions: 1. Sit on the floor with your knees bent and feet lifted off the ground. 2. Lean back slightly and clasp your hands together in front of you. 3. Rotate your torso to the right, then to the left, while keeping your core engaged.

name: Burpees
instructions: 1. Start in a standing position, then squat down and place your hands on the ground. 2. Jump your feet back into a plank position. 3. Perform a push-up. 4. Jump your feet back to the squat position. 5. Explode up into a jump, reaching your arms overhead.

name: Mountain Climbers
instructions: 1. Start in a plank position with your hands directly under your shoulders. 2. Drive one knee towards your chest, then quickly switch legs, as if you're running in place. 3. Continue alternating legs at a fast pace.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
instructions: 1. Sit on a bench with back support, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height. 2. Press the dumbbells upward until your arms are fully extended. 3. Lower the dumbbells back to shoulder height and repeat.

name: Leg Press
instructions: 1. Sit on the leg press machine with your feet shoulder-width apart on the platform. 2. Press the platform upward by straightening your legs, then slowly lower it back down.

name: Barbell Curl
instructions: 1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell with an underhand grip, arms fully extended. 2. Curl the barbell upwards, keeping your elbows close to your body. 3. Lower the barbell back to the starting position.

name: Crunches
instructions: 1. Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor, hands behind your head. 2. Lift your shoulders off the floor by contracting your abdominals, then lower back down.
